question.question: What is the primary goal of rehydration therapy in cases of acute diarrhoea?
question.option_a: To reduce the risk of dehydration
question.option_b: To treat the underlying cause of the diarrhoea
question.option_c: To increase the absorption of electrolytes
question.option_d: To reduce the symptoms of the diarrhoea
